name: JIVA
description: Highly modified ad upto-dated group management telegram bot maintained by anonymous devs of mavens

API_KEY.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot.Worth it. Get it.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Required for updating the bot and other stuff get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Add group id where you want all messages get forwaded from your bot

NO_LOAD.description: Dont load these modules cause they shit, space separation

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks. If you dont know how this works leave it as it is

SUPPORT_USERS.description: List of id's (not usernames) for users which are allowed to gban, but can also be banned.

WHITELIST_USERS.description: List of id's (not usernames) for users which WONT be banned/kicked by the bot.

DEL_CMDS.description: Whether or not you should delete 'blue text must click' commands

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

SUDO_USERS.description: Userid of users you want to keep in sudo
